sql: SELECT HEX(MIN(a)) FROM (SELECT CHAR(0, 1) COLLATE NOCASE as a UNION SELECT CHAR(0, 0) as a); -- 0000

TransferResult.Explanation: The SQLite statement selects the hexadecimal representation of the minimum value from a union of character values. In MongoDB, the aggregation framework is used to achieve similar semantics. The $group stage calculates the minimum value of the literal character (\u0000), and the $project stage converts that minimum value to a string format, effectively mirroring the original SQL logic while adhering to the specified requirements.

MutateResult: {"mutations":[{"cmd":"[{ \"$group\": { \"_id\": null, \"minValue\": { \"$min\": { \"$literal\": \"\\u0000\" } } } }, { \"$project\": { \"_id\": 0, \"minHex\": { \"$toString\": \"$minValue\" } } }]","category":"original","oracle":"tlp_base"},{"cmd":"[{ \"$group\": { \"_id\": null, \"minValue\": { \"$min\": { \"$literal\": \"\\u0000\" } } } }, { \"$project\": { \"_id\": 0, \"minHex\": { \"$toString\": \"$minValue\" } } }, { \"$match\": { \"minHex\": { \"$exists\": true, \"$type\": \"string\" } } }]","category":"tlp_true","oracle":"tlp_partition"},{"cmd":"[{ \"$group\": { \"_id\": null, \"minValue\": { \"$min\": { \"$literal\": \"\\u0000\" } } } }, { \"$project\": { \"_id\": 0, \"minHex\": { \"$toString\": \"$minValue\" } } }, { \"$match\": { \"minHex\": { \"$exists\": true, \"$not\": { \"$type\": \"string\" } } } }]","category":"tlp_false","oracle":"tlp_partition"},{"cmd":"[{ \"$group\": { \"_id\": null, \"minValue\": { \"$min\": { \"$literal\": \"\\u0000\" } } } }, { \"$project\": { \"_id\": 0, \"minHex\": { \"$toString\": \"$minValue\" } } }, { \"$match\": { \"minHex\": { \"$exists\": false } } }]","category":"tlp_null","oracle":"tlp_partition"}]}
